name: Rawbots: Multiplayer Sandbox (Canceled)
blurb: A robot crafting sandbox game, where you can play with amazing robots designed, built and programmed by you.

rewards.reward: PAY'N IT FORWARD\r\n============================== \r\nYou've contributed in the past, or just want to pay it forward. Thank you for your pledge! Spread the word!
FIRST CALL\r\n============================== \r\nDigital downloadable copy of Rawbots, DRM-free. Access to online multiplayer network for 1 user. Steam activation key when available.

BROTHERS IN ARMS\r\n============================== \r\nDigital downloadable copy of Rawbots, DRM-free. Access to online multiplayer network for 1 user. Steam activation key when available. Digital downloadable copy of Rawbots pre-alpha and VIP member access to Rawbots.net as soon as Kickstarter ends.

DIGITAL JUNKIE\r\n============================== \r\nDigital downloadable copy of Rawbots, DRM-free. Access to online multiplayer network for 1 user. Steam activation key when available. Digital downloadable copy of Rawbots pre-alpha and VIP member access to Rawbots.net as soon as Kickstarter ends. Digital Collector's Book in PDF, with developer's diaries, concept art, detailed game manual, strategy guide and robot blueprints. Digital downloadable soundtrack collection.

THE EXECUTIVE\r\n============================== \r\nDigital downloadable copy of Rawbots, DRM-free. Access to online multiplayer network for 1 user. Steam activation key when available. Digital downloadable copy of Rawbots pre-alpha and VIP member access to Rawbots.net as soon as Kickstarter ends. Digital Collector's Book in PDF, with developer's diaries, concept art, detailed game manual, strategy guide and robot blueprints. Digital downloadable soundtrack collection. An executive rendering shader that you can turn on that will make all your bots stand out.

FOUNDER\r\n============================== \r\nDigital downloadable copy of Rawbots, DRM-free. Access to online multiplayer network for 1 user. Steam activation key when available. Digital downloadable copy of Rawbots pre-alpha and VIP member access to Rawbots.net as soon as Kickstarter ends. Digital Collector's Book in PDF, with developer's diaries, concept art, detailed game manual, strategy guide and robot blueprints. Digital downloadable soundtrack collection. An executive rendering shader that you can turn on that will make all your bots stand out. A limited edition body part that will identify you as a Rawbots founder and your name in Special Thanks game credits.

DESIGNER\r\n============================== \r\nDigital downloadable copy of Rawbots, DRM-free. Access to online multiplayer network for 5 users. Steam activation key when available. Digital downloadable copy of Rawbots pre-alpha and 5 VIP member access to Rawbots.net as soon as Kickstarter ends. Digital Collector's Book in PDF, with developer's diaries, concept art, detailed game manual, strategy guide and robot blueprints. Digital downloadable soundtrack collection. An executive rendering shader that you can turn on that will make all your bots stand out. A limited edition body part that will identify you as a Rawbots founder and your name in Special Thanks game credits. A body part designed by you that will carry your brand and be in the final game.

ENGINEER\r\n============================== \r\nDigital downloadable copy of Rawbots, DRM-free. Access to online multiplayer network for 10 users. Steam activation key when available. Digital downloadable copy of Rawbots pre-alpha and 10 VIP member access to Rawbots.net as soon as Kickstarter ends. Digital Collector's Book in PDF, with developer's diaries, concept art, detailed game manual, strategy guide and robot blueprints. Digital downloadable soundtrack collection. An executive rendering shader that you can turn on that will make all your bots stand out. A limited edition body part that will identify you as a Rawbots founder and your name in Special Thanks game credits. A body part designed by you that will carry your brand and be in the final game. A bot part designed by you that will carry your brand and be in the final game.
